name: Virtual Incentives
tag_list: gift-cards, prepaid, e-gift, virtual-cards, offers, incentives, social-rewards, global-gifts, rewards, gamification
overview:
Virtual Incentives offers the most diverse instant virtual gift card selection in the market. This allows companies to connect with their most valuable employees, customers, and partners in ways never before possible.Virtual Incentives is a team of experienced incentive, payments and software development professionals who believe in the power of virtual incentives.

We are focused on delivering virtual incentives for corporate buyers. We passionately believe that the corporate incentives experience should be easy, streamlined, environmentally sustainable and cost effective. We have built the first corporate virtual gifting company that enables our customers to email customized e-gift cards and incentives to any recipient almost anywhere in the world.

Because we understand that there are programs that benefit from a plastic card, we also provide physical prepaid and retailer gift cards. Combined, we are proud to offer our clients and partners the industry’s most exceptional overall selection and value.
